column2: Primary Purpose:  The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of B2B and B2B2C E-Commerce Marketplace Operations such as sellers management, orders management, new products sourcing, stock-taking and website merchandising to ensure smooth flow of operations. Responsibilities: Demonstrate high-level planning, analysis and systems expertise to handle daily operations processes and ensure a smooth daily execution. Taking ownership of various critical processes like interacting with warehouse teams, sellers and logistic partners to make sure orders are fulfilled smoothly via the online platform. Lead a team by implementing short-term and long-term strategies to achieve smooth functioning and demonstrate understanding of performance monitoring and guiding individuals. Build SOPs, monitor to manage the operations processes both offline and on the online portal for operating procedures, workflow diagrams, and training materials for orders fulfilment, cataloging, inventory management, sellers and customers. Building logistics network to fulfil orders pan India. Coordinating the School customers requirements with the internal purchase team in order to provide a smooth, hassle-free shopping experience on our platform. Conduct regular quality audits and work towards continuous improvement of processes and system gaps proactively.  Forecast, plan and support seasonal execution by ensuring the right processes are in place to anticipate trends, issues and needs across various functions. Drive improvements based on data analytics. Interact with sellers, purchases team, content team and technology teams to ensure creation of high-quality product catalogs, display of the right products, product categories and product information on the platform. Help onboard and retain high-potential sellers/retailers/brands onto the seller platform.  Design and implement business rules for discounted pricing, special pricing and offers based on the seller type and customer type on a dedicated online dashboard/web portal such as Magento/Shopify/similar technology platforms. Support software development team to maximize use of technology to improve order efficiency and thus improving the customer experience. Creating escalation matrix to resolving issues related to order fulfilment, vendor management, payments, logistics and warehousing, customers and school parents, etc. Maintain budgets and optimize expenses. Create reports for Stake Holders & Management that track data-driven business outcomes from a bird's eye perspective.  Deliver on ambitious growth plan and targets, develop strategies and help push the business to scale. About the Candidate: Understanding to develop customer care support center and processes for large E-Marketplace platforms.  Understanding of Online Digital/E-commerce business models.  Candidates who have experience of working across domains/ functions in an E-commerce set-up especially start-ups will be highly preferred.  Proactive in identifying issues, deep dive, troubleshoot, and communicate to relevant team heads. The candidate needs to have a consumer and retail approach in understanding of how E-commerce marketplace operations works. User experience with web dashboards such as CMS and ERP tools would be an advantage. Demonstrates openness to change and ability to manage complexities. Expert and possess project management skills as per PMI standards. Seeks out ways to automate and simplify manual processes to improve productivity. Passionate about their work, detail-oriented, analytical, and have excellent problem-solving abilities. Key Interactions:  Internal   E-commerce Operation, E-commerce Customer Support, E-commerce Software Development, E-commerce Sales & BD, Purchase Team, Warehouse Team, School Admin, School Academics, School Marketing. External   Customers, Students/Parent customers, Business customers, Sellers, School Customers, Service Vendor. Qualification:  Any graduate. (MBA preferred) Knowledge of E-Commerce, CMS & ERP software and MS Excel Plus relevant experience related to E-Commerce platform:             - Logistics, Transportation and Distribution             - Supply Chain Management             - Project Management             - Customer Support & Helpdesk             - Vendor Management

column2: ORole & responsibilities     As a Senior Product Manager for Commercial Solutions (customer experience and commercial excellence), you represent the voice of the product by setting the overall strategic vision and roadmap for the product. You are accountable for succeeding against identified metrics, managing ROI of the product, and setting short- and long-term product goals as well as ensuring the product team is effectively working together. You will work, above all strategically, to form a powerful team and ensure the success of the commercial functions at Bekaert. You co-own product responsibilities with the product owners, solution architects and identifies technology solutions to meet business and financial objectives. Main Responsibilities  Partnering      with the Business area for defining and implementing the Commercial IT roadmap      for multiple product tracks (Customer Portals (B2B eCommerce), B2C      eCommerce, Marketing Automation, Corporate and Regional Websites, Pricing Analytics,      and Commercial Analytics and Reporting). You will also be responsible in      streamlining the product operations in alignment with the business      objectives of the organisation. Work collaboratively across      business and technology to build      good understanding of strategic objectives for commercial products,      identifies business outcomes, explores implications, impacts, and risks,      and stakeholders priorities. Work with product owners      and other internal/external stakeholders to define requirements and      priorities. Establish and drive product release plans. Drive customer experience design, prioritization, and management of product tracks.      Engages business stakeholders to identify      technology-enabled innovation opportunities.  Drive technology vision, direction,      and architecture for product tracks. Champion the use of common source components      versus building duplicate functionalities, reduce technical debt while driving new capabilities. Define      and prioritize the product backlog (epics,features, user stories) in order      to deliver a whole, valuable product. Prioritize user stories for focused team progress, clarifying the      definition of done for each user story. Deliver product requirements, changes, and development efforts in an agile manner. Drive value by facilitating release planning, release management meetings, Scrum of Scrums, system demos, and inspect and adapt workshops.  Deliver alignment of IT Operational SLAs & KPIs to Sales and Marketing Functions KPIs. Manage Business Escalations and drive resolution via intervention as needed Ensure strong alignment to enterprise wide governance, security and compliance practices through continuous collaboration and necessary interventions. Manage communications and      ensure visibility of the product development and outcomes. Build      a world-class Digital Engineering teams. Develop team capabilities and manage deployment to provide      customer-focused design and implementation support. Ensure teams have the right      skills and composition to deliver quickly and respond to emerging      requirements with agile approach.  Manage  budget and 3rd Party resources allocation, negotiate contracts      with vendors and promote relevant cost saving initiatives   Preferred candidate profile     12+ years of overall experience, 6+ years into project / product management of commercial / customer solutions Strong business and leadership skills as well as good experience with technology to deliver customer and commercial solutions ( Customer Portals (B2B eCommerce), B2C eCommerce, Marketing Automation, Corporate and Regional Websites, Pricing Analytics, and Commercial Analytics and Reporting, Integration with ERP (SAP SD) ) Demonstrated experience in product leadership and commercial solutions preferably using Adobe Commerce / Magento, Adobe Experience Manager, SAP SD Integration, Power BI visualization, Azure Data Factory, SQL, and Azure Synapse.  Knowledge of existing, new and emerging technologies and ability to practically apply them to new business designs and business models to achieve targeted business outcomes. Solid understanding of product management, agile principles and development methodologies and support agile teams by providing advice and guidance on opportunities, impact and risks. Good Understanding of design thinking, test-driven development and software test automation processes.  Good analytical, planning, organizational and technical skills. Be a voice of reason and command authority to make tough calls. Should have built products with large scale. Experience in managing globally distributed Product teams Experience in building products from scratch and seen the product lifecycle Ability to work within an IT organization in an in-and-out outsourced environment Perks and benefits   Competitive Salary Opportunities for Professional development and growth A supportive and collaborative working enviroment

column2: The company was founded with a heartfelt intention to provide top-quality, affordable baby essentials in the market. Recognizing a gap in the availability of such products, the founders embarked on a journey to offer practical and aesthetically pleasing designs to make parenting easier. From bibs to strollers to fashionable clothing, the company strives to cater to all aspects of parenthood, ensuring that parents can navigate this transformative journey with ease. Compulsory experience of managing online portals like Flipkart, Amazon, Myntra, Meesho, Firstcry.com etc.  - This is Must. Main Responsibility: Overall Business Development of Ecommerce. Managing Amazon and other online portal advertisement. Complete Account Advertisements, PPC management and Payment Reconciliation. This is a full-time on-site role as an Ecommerce manager. As an Ecommerce Specialist, you will be responsible for managing and optimizing all aspects of the company's ecommerce operations. This includes creating and managing product listings, monitoring inventory levels, analyzing sales data, and implementing strategies to improve the overall performance of the ecommerce platform. An expert on Amazon solutions and adapt recommendations based on advertiser needs Manage and Maintain Ecommerce Team and overlook Following things: Managing Advertisement Account Maintaining Catalogue And Managing Inventory Provide assistance in company promotion Taking care of the entire process starting with products uploading on panel, to get them in ongoing promotion till generating effective sales. Optimize campaign performance that fulfils advertiser goals In-depth data analysis to develop actionable insights and recommendations for campaigns Responsible for managing sales, sales strategy and service processes related to assigned suppliers for the Amazon account Experience with Amazon marketplace and/or Amazon retail and an understanding of Vendor Central and Seller Central would be extremely valuable Driving the sales performance of the e-commerce platform Managing and executing promotional campaigns Providing analysis and reporting on metrics such as weekly/monthly sales by department, new product sell-through and offer code performance Creating promotional offers and checking to see that these are uploaded precisely. Analyzing traffic to inform website maintenance and the effectiveness of marketing strategies. Examining sales-related metrics to inform restocks. Reporting on the utility of existing and novel strategies. Develop and execute strategies to bring in prospect accounts and grow existing accounts to meet overall company plan and goals. Manage all online activity in relation to traffic acquisition, sales, conversion and a/b testing and reporting Maintain current knowledge of industry trends, opportunities, channels, products, and competitors to be a trusted business advisor to accounts.

column2: As a Senior Manager Space & Presentation, youll take the lead as you serve as a key thought partner to Divisionals, Sr. Directors, and Visual Merchandising by influencing strategy through space and presentation. You will leverage data to discover key trends and insights to create recommendations in order to guide pyramid and division space allocation and presentation.          Leading a global business unit of presentation business partners and specialists to ensure the execution of your team s strategies, leading your team to develop and drive timing and actions, lead their cross-functional team (CFT), and hold others accountable to key deadlines and quality expectations will be a crucial part of your role.          Through communication and partnership, it will be important to effectively build cross-functional partnerships with other support teams, and ensure the communication of key information to the cross-functional team and stores.          The Senior Manager Space & Presentation actively participates in CFTs to ensure strategies are implemented, and to educate team members on the impact of their decisions.          You will lead and coach your team to use qualitative and quantitative data to create space and program recommendations to optimize highly visible and continuously evolving assets. In addition, you will provide strategic direction, coaching and development, training and workload management for the Space and Presentation team.          Core responsibilities of this job are described within this job description. Job duties may change at any time due to business needs.                    About you:                  Four-year degree or equivalent experience                12+ years of experience in retail                Strong team leadership and ability to engage and inspire others                Excellent planning, organizational, and decision-making skills                Excellent analytical, problem solving, and strategic thinking skills                Ability to communicate effectively, collaborate, and relate well to others                Ability to demonstrate courage, think critically, and drive for results                Prior supervisory experience preferred

column2: Develop a deep understanding of the brand catalogue and merchants, including detailed specifications, measurements, materials used, costing, and margins across the value chain.       Analyze and track listings performance on various parameters such as sales, conversion rates, quantity sold, etc. Continuously monitor competition and their unique selling propositions (USPs) to identify areas for improvement.     Collaborate with merchants to organize deals, promotions, and interventions to drive sales and improve overall performance.     Work closely with online and offline channels to achieve business results by creating product understanding, highlighting unique selling points (USPs), and conducting regular training sessions with frontline teams. Ensure availability of new launches and high-quality merchandise in studios to drive sales.     Apply thorough knowledge of CNI (Catalogue Name Identification), CLP (Catalogue Listing Page), CLIP (Catalogue Listing Image Placement), VIP (Visibility Improvement Program), and Listings Placement on all forms including web, WAP, and app to optimize product visibility and improve sales performance.     Stay updated on the latest trends and collaborate with the sourcing team to launch new products. Take proactive measures to address underperforming listings.     Collaborate with the Business Head on supply pricing strategies and ensure flawless execution.     Work with the Business Head on stock ordering, inventory planning, and control to optimize stock levels and minimize stockouts or excess inventory.     Manage experience and fulfillment metrics, including On-Time In-Full (OTIF) delivery, ratings and reviews, Net Promoter Score (NPS), refund rates, and return rates. Implement strategies to improve customer satisfaction and reduce returns/refunds.
